text: Hi, I was wondering is it against any of the public app requirements to use a third-party integration pipeline tools (such as Prismatic or Cyclr) to handle some of the data transfer, logging etc.

I don’t think you would have any problems on the HubSpot side, if you are complying with API rates etc. You might have others terms to comply with on the 3rd party tools side, especially if it’s a paid app. Terms may limit you to handling your own data not as an app for others.
